Text:
Seeding a bit (like 24h at least) would not hurt the torrent!!
But since it is such a rare (German language comics) and nicely put together torrent still thumbs up and I hope a seed will appear again.
Thx...

Glad you appreciate it. I am currently seeding and will continue to do so for the time being. Apparently TPB cannot recognise my seeding. My internet connection isn't the fastest, also, so it might take some time...
From time to time - when I'm online gaming - the seeding may be down for a few hours, but it will be back up.
